Chyba najleprza gra logiczna i Co-OP-owa świata. I mówie szczerą prawde...
Z pierwszej osoby strzelamy dwa portale, w prawie dowolne miejsca na mapie. Kiedy cokolwiek wniknie w jeden, wyjdzie po drugiej stronie... A celem jest ukończenie wszystkich komór testowych do których nas wrzucono, wykonując działania za pomocą portali i praw fizyki.
W co-op jest jeszcze więcej zabawy bo mamy aż 4 portale. Świetnie zrobiona i baaardzo wciąga.
It's a realy good game, but only if you like puzzles. :D

Portal e uma das minha series de jogos favoritas esse jogo alem de ser um simples jogo de puzzle ele conssegue passar uma historia escondida e revelada aos poucos dando um ar de misterio e deixando muitas coisas em branco sobre a historia do jogo.

PÓS:
-Modo historia otimo
-Coop
-Mapas da comunidade
-Poder criar seu propio mapa

CONTRAS:
-Poucas pessoas jogam no coop
-A valve não sabe contar até 3

Nunca te pedi nada valve, lança Portal 3.

My personal favourite game. Gives hours of mind straining puzzles for you to leap and portal your way through, with an amazing and riveting story to accompany you through. Co-op is also very well built, and I like how you absolutely have to work together to make it through. *****

A parte la bellezza degli enigmi che sono sempre divertenti e offrono il giusto livello di difficoltà, la vera chicca è l'ironia e la genialità dei dialoghi. Una decina di ore di gioco da non perdere!
Одним словом Valve, продалжать даже слов нет, максимально проработаная игра!

My favourite game ever! It even beats the fallouts! This game for me was just fantastic! The puzzles are brilliant, it has just the right amount of humour and lore and the story is bliss! I can not think about this game without getting all happy just thinking about it :')

its fun really fun

8/10 - Fun game.  Puzzles were just the right level of challenging.  I had to resort to a walkthrough only once because I was stuck.  I got through it in 12 hours, so not a ton of play time, but appropriate for the price.  As before, GlaDOS steals the show.  Cave Johnson was a close second though (J.K. Simmons). and a close 3rd for Wheatley. Well done Valve.
Literally the best game ever made.

Portal 2 is evolution from Portal. You still have to solve puzzles (rooms) by your portals-making gun, with some small aditions and more polished game design. It now offers 6-7 hours singleplayer campaign as well as 5-6 hours of co-op campaign, plus workshop support with user made maps. While i think singleplayer is slightly worse than it the first one, coop is where the game shines.
Ребят, очень очень классно
The fact you can make/download maps for this game plus its amazing Co-Op also makes it a must have for any puzzle enthuiast.
Great game
I'm in space!
best game  evar!
There is something about this game that I just love, even if it hurts my brain cells at times. The style is eye-catching and the portal orientated puzzles are entertaining and sufficiently difficult.

Одна из гениальнейших игр, в которой надо включать мозги и просто развлекаться. Valve действительно молодцы, что вывели игру на новый качественный уровень.
Everyone should have this game.

The highly anticipated sequel to 2007's Game of the Year, PORTAL 2 is a hilariously mind-bending adventure that challenges you to use wits over weaponry in a funhouse of diabolical science.

Using a highly experimental portal device, you'll once again face off against a lethally inventive, power-mad A.I. named GLaDOS. And this time you won't be alone. Meet an expanded cast of characters as you think your way through dangerous, never-before-seen areas of Aperture Laboratories.

Break the laws of spatial physics in ways you never thought possible, with a wider variety of portal puzzles and an expansive story that spans a single player and co-operative game mode.
Good game, especially in coop.

The one and only puzzle game, Portal. Now in CO-OP version and more story? :O

[h1]Pros:[/h1]

+ Great story

+ Easy to make servers

[h1]Cons:[/h1]

[h1]Summary[/h1]
Great game as always, the CO-OP System is just perfect. Very fun 10/10

Continuação do aclamado quebra cabeças em primeira pessoa:Portal.Nessa continuação,tudo é melhorado e ampliado mas o objetivo continua o mesmo:Fugir de uma inteligência artificial insana que quer impedir que você escape de um complexo científico totalmente dominado por ela,cheio de obstáculos e armadilhas cruéis para fazê-lo ir a loucura.

GET. THIS. GAME. NOW.
Extra reason to get it: best quote of the year is: "Hi. How are you doing? I'm a potato" while falling down a death pit

This sequal to the short, but amazing well-crafted (and genre-breaking) game of the same name (minus the 2) is by far the most well written game I have ever played. The gameplay is solid and the puzzles cause one to think without being impossible. But where this game really shines is the story and the writting. The overall story really sucks you into the world Valve created and the dialogue has you laughing constantly. I can't recommend this game enough. You don't need to play the original Portal to appreciate this game, but it well worth checking out as well.

Захватило, прошёл несколько раз и ещё хочу. Просто бегать одно удовольствие! Очень оживляет игру преднамерянно туповатый ИИ в роли напарника/соперника. Подход к геймплею очень атмосферный, это уже не первая часть с одними только ребусами.
Super jeu pour son solo vous allez pas être déçu + la coo-op avec un pote de gros délire a ce faire !
Pepino de juego!!

+ Looks great
+ Enjoyable characters (GLaDOS, Wheatley, Cave Johnson)
+ Entertaining Co-op

One of my favourite puzzle games along Kula World and Tomb Raider. Not only is the gameplay amazing, the plot is just as good if not better. A huge step up from already a nearly perfect game. It's much longer, it features co-op mode and you can make and share your own maps with a FREE map builder.

One of the best games I've ever had the pleasure of playing! 

This game is Amazing !

Edit: Still the best.
Если вы сильны в матиматике, и задачки по физике для вас ничто, то покупайте игру, А ЕСЛИ ВЫ ГРЁБАННЫЙ ГУМУНИТАРИЙ, ТО ИДИТЕ НА ХУЙ ВООБЩЕ.

Look, it's like Portal only with twice as much portaling and a leopard king turret taking over the earth.  Best humor writing in my collection.
hammer game, lohnt sich. Und der Co-op ist ebenfalls klasse

The learning progress in this game is very good and the story is even better. The way they've managed to combine the tasks with the story is just awesome. You don't feel like your moving from one test chamber to the other just to get out of the facility. You actually feel there's a point with going through the tests. 

The tests in itself are great. It's puzzles you have to solve, some of them are very difficult while others are just purely fun. The obstacles vary from chamber to chamber and that pushes you to think in different ways. In some of the tests you can almost feel your pulse increases because it's so intense and it feels so lively.

I strongly recommend this game to everyone!
Just ......Amazing !
еще одна Шикарная игра от Valve)
Чисто игра для логики и узнать ты сильно тупой или нет. 10 портальных пушек из 10.

Продолжения одной из интереснейшей игры! Геймплей остаётся прежним, но это не портить игру. Сюжет, конечно, лучше 1 портала: персонажи сделали очень приятными и запоминающими, много отсылок из вселенной Half-Life. Так же радует ко-оп, играя за двух забавных роботов, где у них свой отдельный сюжет, но это не главное! Главное геймплей с другим человеком очень забавно, весело и увлекательно - особенно с другом. Как и 1 портал, так 2 часть  я всем рекомендую обязательно сыграть в эту замечательную игру!
simply one of the best games ever made, this game takes what the first one did right and amped it up to 100! great graphics, level design, story, music, characters everything!

Both Portal and Portal 2 is not just your everyday puzzle game, it is a puzzle game in the form of first person. Portal 2 provides a really smooth gameplay with awesome voice acting and HD performance.

It is a great game and definately worth its cost. It has an amazing storyline and really is very deep. I must admit there is not to much replay value but tons of story. There is singleplayer with the very deep storyline behind Chell that is very indepth and interesting, and multiplayer is the bit more lighthearted funny storyline. I found it an amazing game that I loved. It is my favorite game of all time.

Thoroughly pleased with this game.  I think that one should play the first one before this to fully get everything from the storyline, but even if you didn't I'm sure this game would still be enjoyable.  It's funny, it's fun, the storyline is engaging, and the graphics are amazing.  I don't know what else I can ask for....Portal 3?

This game put you in a realist environment with one task. Solve the Puzzle! The small puzzel elements really push this game over the limit and force you to think outside the box. The story is intriging and gives you something to think about on loading screens and is outright hilarious.
L'un des Meilleurs jeu du monde ! Un titre incontournable de la culture vidéoludique.

I never thought you can make such a twisty plot in a puzzle game like Portal 2... Really... I didn't even want to try it and only installed it for game cards, but as soon as I started it, I realized that I fell in love with that game... Awesome plot, dialogues and gameplay, aswell as graphics.
It's an awesome game that is definitey worth purchasing. Oh, and there's also a coop mode where you can have even more fun together with your friend!

Portal 2 carries the core mechanic from the original to  inspiring new directions, the most interesting being co-op puzzle solving. Four portals, two brains, endless user levels. Buy two on sale and gift one.

Excelente jogo, a história é muito divertida (a melhora em relação ao primeiro é significativa) e os puzzles são bem desafiadores às vezes. Durante algum tempo, as fases não apresentam muitas mudanças de uma pra outra, o que pode deixar o jogo um pouquinho cansativo, mas as linhas de diálogo muito bem elaboradas compensam. A história tem alguns plot twists bem legais! Quando você começa não dá vontade de parar de jogar.

8,5 pro jogo, certamente vale a pena!
Thaz Da GAME!

Portal 2 is such a great game! The Singleplayer Campaign is really original and the Coop is really fun to play! You can even make your own Test Chambers and share them! This game is a must have!
